description.displayText:
Alethea worked for us for 8 months. She began caring for both of my parents (90 yo, 91 yo) and stayed with us to care for Mom after Dad passed on and for me as I recovered from surgery.
She is compassionate and gentle. Alethea did an excellent job of keeping me informed of any challenges they were creating or experiencing. She works efficiently and quietly.  There were times she was so quiet I forgot she was in the house. Alethea is happiest when there is a lot to do for her charges. She also is very effective at guiding her clients to making better choices, like regularly completing their excercises and structuring their meals to having a heavier meal midday and a lighter meal during the evening. She was also flexible and willing to work with us when our regular schedule  changed. 

Alethea P is an excellent caregiver. She is a good and hard worker.

description.displayText: Alethea is fantastic. She is professional, dependable, honest and helpful. She cared for both my elderly (87 yo, 93 yo) parents in my home for the month they lived with me. She asked questions about their life and my Dad enjoyed sharing his stories. My mother said the showers Alethea gave her were heavenly. Alethea cared for my mom's wounds and made sure both of their skin was massaged with lotion to improve circulation. They felt better as soon as Alethea began caring for them. My parents moved into an Assisted Living Facility, otherwise we would continue with Alethea. You would be lucky to have Alethea care for your loved one, we certainly were!
